articles.headline: Watch a Robot Evolve: How AI Mimics Natural Selection in Real Time
articles.hook: Imagine if your robot could adapt on its own—like a living organism. This research shows how AI can mimic evolution, revolutionizing robotics and AI.
articles.difficulty: Sophomore-level, as it requires foundational knowledge in computer science, biology, and mathematics.

articles.headline: Jacob’s Ladder: How Sparks Turned into Scientific Breakthroughs
articles.hook: Ever wondered why lightning crackles or why arc welders wear special gear? This research reveals the science behind those sparks—and how it could revolutionize energy storage.
articles.difficulty: Sophomore (requires foundational knowledge in chemistry, physics, and engineering).
